body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Evans Motors customer support. My name is Matthew Evans, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Matthew. My name is Debra Bryant.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Debra! To better assist you, I need a few details. Can you please provide me with your date of birth and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is two six zero three one nine eight zero, and my phone number is six zero five eight two one four three zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra. I've noted down your information. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, Matthew. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Debra. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
